from fluidity_tools import stat_parser s = stat_parser("vanKekenOneA.detectors")
l = len(s['Fluid']['Temperature']['TSlab_01']) sum = numpy.zeros(l)
for n in range(36): T = s["Fluid"]["Temperature"]["TSlab_" + (str(n + 1)).rjust(2, '0')] sum = sum + T*T
